price: ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ បណ្ដាអ្នកដែលសាងអំពើល្អ គឺពួកគេទទួល ទានស្រាដែលលាយជាមួយវាអំពីទឹកក្រអូបកាហ្វូរ។
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسٖ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: inna al-abrāra yashrabūna min kasin kāna mizājuhā kāfūran
